name: Care Connect Medication Dosage Method
description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes the e-Prescribing method. Any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'NHS e-Prescribing method subset' with subset original id 30101000001130; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is 'ePrescribing method simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset Id 999000041000001103.
